qa_pair.question: Query all active projects and identify which one has the most overdue review date. What is the project name?
Using the projects tool, list all projects and identify how many are completely empty with zero tasks.
Query all tasks assigned to the "Pending Purchase Orders" project and count the total number of tasks in that project.
Among tasks in the "Pending Purchase Orders" project, how many are in an available state (not blocked by dependencies)?
Find all projects with a sequential workflow constraint enabled. Name the first sequential project found.
Query for all overdue tasks and identify how many of them are marked as flagged (high priority).
Group overdue tasks by project and identify which project has the most overdue tasks.
Using task and project queries, what is the name of the highest priority flagged task that is overdue?
qa_pair.answer: Call Kurzweil support regarding the Cyber security course

qa_pair.question: Query projects with empty status and find how many projects are currently on hold.
Analyze the projects list and identify the project that has not been modified since earliest date but still contains active tasks. What is its name?
